text: Kapilas Road Junction railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Kapilas Road. Its code is KIS. It has five platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Kapilas Road Junction railway station. ==Major Trains== * Sri Jagannath Express ==See also== * Cuttack district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Cuttack district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Kapilas Road Junction railway station
